short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds Phoebe Fatigue calculations to Dotlan's Jump Planner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small plugin which adds dynamic jump fatigue calculations to Dotlan's popular Jump Planner.

If you'd like to support this extension, feel free to donate ISK to Capri Sun KraftFoods ingame. https://gate.eveonline.com/Profile/Capri%20Sun%20KraftFoods
